<Variable name="body.text.color" description="body.text.color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/>
</Group>

</Group>

<Variable name="primary.color.hover" description="primary.color.hover" type="color" default="#FFFFFF" value="#FFFFFF"/>

/* LAYOUT */
#layout {padding:50px;max-width:100%;}
#layout #SettingBlog {background-color:#E4EBEE;color:#000}
#layout #sidedrawer{position:static;width:50%;float:left}
#layout #sidedrawer li{display:none}
#layout #header{position:static;float:right;width:50%}
#layout #main-sidebar{float:right;width:45%}
#layout #main-wrapper{float:left;width:45%}
#layout #AdsMain{overflow:hidden;width:auto%;clear:both;margin:10px auto}
#layout #footer{clear:both;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:20px;}
#layout #website-footer{clear:both;width:auto}		

/* Normalization */html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,table,caption,tbody,tfoot,thead,tr,th,td,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline}a img{border-width:0}img{max-width:100%;vertical-align:middle;border:0;height:auto}b,strong{font-weight:700}cite,em,i{font-style:italic}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,section{display:block}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}dt{font-weight:bold}dd{margin:0 0 .5em 2em}abbr,acronym{cursor:help}sup,sub{vertical-align:baseline;position:relative;top:-.4em;font-size:86%}sub{top:.4em}small{font-size:86%}mark{background-color:#ffce00;color:#182025}hr{height:1px;border:0;background-color:#ddd}input,button,select,textarea{font-size:100%;line-height:normal;vertical-align:baseline}textarea{display:block;box-sizing:border-box}/* blogger component */.widget,.section{margin:0}.widget li{padding:0}.widget ul{padding:0;margin:0;line-height:normal}.widget-content li{list-style-type:none}.separator a {margin:initial!important;}.separator a img{margin: 1em;}.separator:nth-child(1) a img{margin:initial;margin-bottom:1em}.Navbar {display:none}/* ROOT */::-moz-selection{background-color:#b3d4fc;color:#ffffff;text-shadow:none}::selection{background-color:#b3d4fc;color:#ffffff;text-shadow:none}body{font-family:"HelveticaNeue-Light","Helvetica Neue Light","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,"Lucida Grande",sans-serif;font-weight:400;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;line-height:1.625;background:$(body.background.color);color:$(body.text.color)}@media (max-width:554px){body{background:#fff}}/* universal component */.hidden{visibility:hidden;height:0;overflow:hidden;display:none}.clear{clear:both}.shadow {-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);}.padding-0 {padding:0;}/* custom framework */.mui-dropdown__menu li a{padding:8px 5px 8px 15px;line-height:1.5}/* heading */h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{display:block;font-weight:700}h1{font-size:150%}h2{font-size:140%}h3{font-size:130%}h4{font-size:120%}h5{font-size:110%}/* LINK */a:link {color:$(link.color);text-decoration: none;margin: 0;-webkit-transition: ease-in-out .2s;-moz-transition: ease-in-out .2s;-ms-transition: ease-in-out .2s;-o-transition: ease-in-out .2s;transition: ease-in-out .2s}a:visited {color:$(link.color.visited);}a:hover {color:$(link.color.hover);}/* content component */hr{border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);display:block;margin-bottom:16px;width:100%}p{margin:0;margin-bottom:16px}small{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.54);vertical-align:bottom}figcaption{font-family:Georgia,Times,"Times New Roman",serif}u{text-decoration:underline}s{text-decoration:line-through}sup{font-size:14px;vertical-align:super}sub{font-size:14px;vertical-align:sub}mark{background:#ffeb3b}hr{border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);display:block;margin-bottom:16px;width:100%}img{height:auto;max-width:100%;vertical-align:baseline}/* pre code blockquote*/code,pre{font-family:Menlo,Monaco,Consolas,"Courier New",monospace;font-size:16px;color:rgba(0,0,0,.8)}pre{background:#efefef;margin:16px 0;white-space:pre-wrap;margin:10px 0;padding:10px 15px;border:1px solid #ddd}code{line-height:inherit;word-break:break-all;word-wrap:break-word}blockquote{border-left:2px solid #2196f3;font-family:Georgia,Times,"Times New Roman",serif;margin:16px 0;padding-left:16px}/* table */table{width:100%}table th{color:#4285f4;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-size:18px}table td{border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top}table caption{border:none;font-style:italic}th{font-weight:700}td,th{padding:8px;line-height:1.42857143;vertical-align:top;text-align:left;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12)}table.striped tr:nth-child(even) >td{background-color:#f2f2f2}table.dark tr,table.dark th{background-color:#212529;color:#fff}table.dark.striped tr:nth-child(even) > td,table.dark.striped tr > th{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.05)}table.tr-caption-container{width:auto}table.tr-caption-container td{padding:8px;background:#fff!important}table.tr-caption-container td a{margin:0!important}/* custom component */a.download, a.demo {background:#2196f3;border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);border-radius: 4px;color: #fff;cursor: pointer;display: inline-block;margin: 0;padding: 8px 16px;text-align: center;vertical-align: middle;white-space: nowrap;text-decoration: none;}a.download:hover,a.download:active,a.demo:hover,a.demo:active {background:#0c7cd5;border-color: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)}

#content-wrapper{padding:20px 0}
@media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper{display:block!important}#main-sidebar{display:none!important}}

#content-wrapper{padding:20px 0}
@media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper{float:left;width:65%;display:block!important}#main-sidebar{float:right;width:35%;display:block!important}#website-footer-widget{display:block!important}}
@media (max-width:767px){#main-wrapper,#main-sidebar,.website-footer-widget .widget{float:none!important;width:100%!important}#main-sidebar,#website-footer-widget{display:none}}

PAGE WRAPPER

@media(min-width:768px){#main-wrapper{display:block!important}#main-sidebar,#website-footer-widget{display:none!important}}
#main-wrapper{width:auto;float:none}
#main-sidebar{display:none}
@media(min-width:544px){.mui-container{max-width:420px}}
@media(min-width:768px){.mui-container{max-width:540px}}
@media(min-width:992px){.mui-container{max-width:720px}}
@media(min-width:1200px){.mui-container{max-width:960px}}

INDEX PAGE
================================================= 

.blog-posts{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;margin:0}
div.post-outer-container{display:flex;width:100%}
.blog-posts article.post{display:flex;width:33.33%;width:calc(100% / 3)}
.blog-posts article.post:nth-child(3n+1){clear:both}
.blog-posts .post-thumbnail{height:240px;overflow:hidden;position:relative}
.blog-posts .post-content{background-color:#fff;display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:100%;margin:10px}
.post-header{position:relative}
.post-label-snippet,.post-content .comment-link{position:absolute;left:5px;text-transform:lowercase;background:;font-size:12px;padding:2px 8px}
.post-label-snippet{top:5px}
.post-content .comment-link{bottom:5px;opacity:0}
.post-content:hover .comment-link{opacity:1}
.post-content .comment-link,.post-label-snippet a{color:}
.blog-posts .post-content:hover .post-thumbnail img{-webkit-transform:rotate(3deg) scale(1.1);transform:rotate(3deg) scale(1.1)}
.blog-posts .post-content .post-thumbnail img{width:100%;height:100%;-webkit-transition:.3s ease-in-out;transition:.3s ease-in-out}
.blog-posts .post-title-index{border-top:1px solid ;padding:10px;position:relative;flex:1 0 auto}
.blog-posts .post-title-index h2{font-size:16px}
/* RESPONSIVE */
@media (max-width:991px){.blog-posts article.post{width:calc(100% / 2)}.blog-posts article.post:nth-child(3n+1){clear:inherit}.blog-posts article.post:nth-child(2n+1){clear:both}}
@media (max-width:767px){.blog-posts article.post:nth-child(3n+1){clear:inherit}.blog-posts article.post:nth-child(2n+1){clear:inherit}.blog-posts article.post{width:100%}.blog-posts .post-content{display:initial;flex-direction:initial;padding:0;margin-bottom:5px;border:1px solid ;box-shadow:none}.blog-posts .post-thumbnail img{width:100px}.blog-posts .post-title-index{padding:10px 15px;border:none;flex:none;display:flex;background:none}.blog-posts .post-thumbnail{max-height:80px;width:100px;float:right}.post-label-snippet,.post-info-index,.comment-link{display:none}.blog-posts .post-content:hover .post-thumbnail img{-webkit-transform:none;transform:none}}
@media (max-width:360px){.blog-posts .post-title-index h2{font-size:16px}}

=================================================
POST PAGE
================================================= 

.blog-posts{padding-bottom:10px;padding-right:10px}
@media (max-width:767px){.blog-posts{padding-right:0}}
.blog-posts .post-title{text-align:center;font-weight:bold;padding:20px;border-bottom:1px solid }
.post-info{text-align:center;padding:10px 20px;position:relative;display:block;border-bottom:1px solid ;font-size:12px}
.post-content-single{background:;border:1px solid }
@media (max-width:554px){.post-content-single{background:none;border:none}}
/* BODY */			
.post-body-single{padding:10px 20px;word-wrap:break-word}
.post-body-single ul,.post-body-single ol{margin:10px 30px}
.post-body-single ul li{padding:2px}
.post-body-single iframe{max-width:100%;max-height:100%}
.post-body-single .separator a{display:block}
/* RESPONSIVE */
@media(max-width:768px){.post-body-single{font-size:18px}}
@media(max-width:544px){.post-body-single .separator a{margin:0 0 10px!important;float:none!important}.post-body-single{padding:10px 15px}}

=== post share ===
.article-share{padding-top:20px}
.article-share h3{display:inline-block;position:relative;bottom:10px;font-size:12px}
.article-share .share-social{display:inline-block}

=== post label ===
.article-label{padding-bottom:20px}
.article-label h3{display:inline-block;font-size:12px}
.post-label{position:static;border:1px solid ;padding:2px 5px;border-radius:4px;margin:10px 0;font-size:12px}
.post-label a{color:initial}

=== post author ===
.post-author-profile{background:;}
.post-author-profile{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid }
.post-author-profile h3{font-size:18px;text-align:left;padding:15px;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid }
.post-author-inner{padding:20px 15px;overflow:hidden}
.post-author-profile h3:before{content:'';background-color:;left:0;width:35%;height:2px;bottom:-2px;position:absolute}
.post-author-profile:hover > h3::before{width:10%!important;-webkit-transition:width 0.2s;-moz-transition:width 0.2s;-ms-transition:width 0.2s;-o-transition:width 0.2s;transition:width 0.2s}						
.post-author-profile .author-image{float:left;width:15%;margin-right:15px}
@media (max-width:554px){.post-author-profile h3{padding:10px 15px!important}.post-author-inner{padding:10px 15px!important}.post-author-profile{border:none!important;margin:0!important}}

=== post reaction ===
.article-reaction{padding:0}
.article-reaction h3{display:inline-block;font-size:12px}
.reaction-iframe{position:relative;width:85%;height:1.5rem;overflow-y:auto;vertical-align:middle;border:0}

=== post location ===
.article-location h3{display:inline-block;font-size:12px}
.post-location{display:block;background:;margin:10px 0}

=== post backlink ===
.article-backlinks{padding:0}
.article-backlinks h3{display:inline-block;font-size:12px}

=== post email ===
.article-email{padding:0}
.article-email h3{display:inline-block;font-size:12px}

=== post comment ===
#comments{display:none;}
#comments{background:;}
#comment-editor{height:210px;width:100%!important;background:transparent url('data:image/gif;base64,') no-repeat 50% 30%}
#comments{border:1px solid }
#comments h3{padding:20px 15px;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid }
#comments h3:before{content:'';background-color:;left:0;width:35%;height:2px;bottom:-2px;position:absolute}		
#comments:hover > h3::before{width:10%!important;-webkit-transition:width 0.2s;-moz-transition:width 0.2s;-ms-transition:width 0.2s;-o-transition:width 0.2s;transition:width 0.2s}				
#comments .footer{padding:10px 15px}
#comments ol ol .continue{display:none}
.comments .comment-message{padding:10px 15px;line-height:1.5;margin:5px;margin-bottom:15px;border:1px solid ;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none}
.comments{clear:both;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0;line-height:1em}
.comments .comments-content{padding:20px 15px;font-size:12px;margin-bottom:16px;font-weight:normal;text-align:left;line-height:1.4em}
.comments .continue a,.comments .comment .comment-actions a{display:inline;font-size:12px;padding:2px 5px;margin-right:10px;border:1px solid }
.comments .continue a:active,.comments .comment .comment-actions a:active{position:relative;top:1px}
.comments .continue{text-align:center;padding:10px 0}
.comments .continue a{padding:10px}
.comments .comments-content .comment-thread ol{list-style-type:none;padding:0}
.comments .comments-content .inline-thread{padding:.5em 1em 0 1em}
.comments .comments-content .comment-thread:empty{display:none}
.comments .comments-content .comment:first-child{padding-top:16px}
.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-top:1em;margin-left:40px;font-size:12px}
.comments .comments-content .comment{padding-bottom:8px;margin-bottom:0}
.comments .comments-content .comment:last-child{border-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0}
.comments .comments-content .comment-body{position:relative}
.comments .comments-content .user{font-style:normal;font-weight:bold}
.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author{width:18px;height:18px;display:inline-block;margin:0 0 -4px 6px}
.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author:before{font-family:fontawesome;content:"\f2be";position:relative;color:}
.comments .comments-content .datetime{margin-left:6px;font-size:11px;float:right}
.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px}
.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px;text-align:none;margin:15px 0 15px}
.comments .comments-content .owner-actions{position:absolute;right:0;top:0}
.comments .comments-replybox{border:0;height:250px;width:100%}
.comments .comment-replybox-single{margin-top:5px;margin-left:48px}
.comments .comment-replybox-thread{margin-top:5px}
.comments .comments-content .loadmore a{display:block;padding:10px 16px;text-align:center}
.comments .thread-toggle{cursor:pointer;display:inline-block}
.comments .comments-content .loadmore{cursor:pointer;max-height:3em;margin-top:3em}
.comments .comments-content .loadmore.loaded{max-height:0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden}
.comments .thread-chrome.thread-collapsed{display:none}
.comments .thread-toggle{display:inline-block}
.comments .thread-toggle .thread-arrow{display:inline-block;height:6px;width:7px;overflow:visible;margin:.3em;padding-right:4px}
.comments .thread-expanded .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAc AAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAG0lEQVR42mNgwAfKy8v/48I4FeA0AacVDFQBAP9wJkE/KhUMAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent}
.comments .thread-collapsed .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAA AcAAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAJUlEQVR42mNgAILy8vL/DLgASBKnApgkVgXIkhgKiNKJ005s4gDLbCZBiSxfygAAAAB JRU5ErkJggg==") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent}
.comments .avatar-image-container{float:left;overflow:hidden}
.comments .avatar-image-container img{width:36px}
.comments .comment-block{margin-left:48px;position:relative;padding:15px 20px 15px 20px;border:1px solid ;overflow:hidden;border-image:initial}
@media(max-width:768px){#comments .footer,#commentsHolder{padding:20px 15px!important}}
@media(max-width:480px){.comments .comments-content .datetime{float:none;display:block;margin:0}.comments .comment-header{max-height:30px;overflow:hidden}.comments .comments-content .comment{position:relative}.comments .avatar-image-container{position:absolute;right:0;margin:2px}.comments .comment-block{margin-left:0}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-left:15px}}
.comment-disable{padding:20px 15px;background:;margin:10px 0;font-weight:bold}
#comments.comments-button{display:block;clear:both;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0;line-height:1em}
.comment-button{background:;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.12);border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;margin:10px;padding:8px 16px;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap}
.comment-button a{color:}
@media (max-width:554px){#comments{border:none!important;margin:0!important}#comments h3{padding:10px 15px!important}.comments .comments-content{padding:10px 15px!important}#comments .footer{padding:10px 15px!important}#commentsHolder{padding:10px 15px!important}.comments .comments-content{border:none!important;margin:0!important}}

=== next and prev ===
#blog-pager-container{display:none;}
#blog-pager{background:;}
#blog-pager-container{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid }
#blog-pager-container .pager-border:before{content:'';background-color:;left:0;width:35%;height:2px;bottom:-2px;position:absolute}	
#blog-pager-container:hover > .pager-border::before{width:10%!important;-webkit-transition:width 0.2s;-moz-transition:width 0.2s;-ms-transition:width 0.2s;-o-transition:width 0.2s;transition:width 0.2s}
#blog-pager{display:block;padding:20px 15px;overflow:hidden}
#blog-pager .blog-pager-kiri{float:left;width:50%;text-align:left}
#blog-pager .blog-pager-kanan{float:right;width:50%;display:block;text-align:right}
#blog-pager-container .pager-border{position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid }
@media (max-width:554px){#blog-pager{padding:10px 15px!important}#blog-pager-container{border:none!important;margin:0!important}}

maxsnippet = 150,

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(){

function kodein_extracturl(url) {
var hostname;
if (url.indexOf("://") > -1) {hostname = url.split('/')[2];}
else {hostname = url.split('/')[0];}
hostname = hostname.split(':')[0];
hostname = hostname.split('?')[0];
return hostname;
}
function kodein_exception(){
var exception = new Array();	
exceptionurl = exceptionurl;
exception = exceptionurl.split(",");
return exception;
}
var exceptionurl = "google.com,twitter.com,javascript:;";
if (!exceptionurl) {
exceptionurl = window.location.href;
}else {
exceptionurl += ","+window.location.href;
}
var links = 'http://idsly.com/';
var api = 'bcf277a76b58852ccf37a394d5d9344d391578c0';
var advert_type = 2;	


var linktag = document.getElementsByTagName("a");
var exception = kodein_exception();
var check = false;
var no = 0;
var exceptionlength = exception.length;
var checklink = "";
var checkexception = "";
for (var i = 0; i < linktag.length; i++) {	
check = false;
no = 0;
while (check == false && no < exceptionlength) {
checklink = kodein_extracturl(linktag[i].href);			
checkexception = kodein_extracturl(exception[no]);
if (checklink.match(checkexception)) {
check = true;
}
no++;
}
if (check == false) {
linktag[i].href = linktag[i].href = links + "full/?api="+ encodeURIComponent(api)+"&url="+ encodeURIComponent(linktag[i].href)+"&type="+ encodeURIComponent(advert_type);
}
}	
});
//]]>
</script>
